page.title: 04BUILDING CONTRACTORS
page.content: The firm{Costains}was established in{ {1865}in{Crosby.} The firm became larger and larger so that today it has over 15 branches in Britain and many branches overseas. The branch near to our school produces{window}and{door {frames}for their building section. The branch employs between 50 and 55 people such as joiners, plumbers and labourers. We were shown round the works by Mr.Cassels the manager, and he told us that the working day there is eight hours long with no shift work. The firm uses many forms of transport such as pick-up trucks, vans and flat waggons which are used to carry their finished frames. The Fazakerley branch is about 15-20 acres in size and includes a carpentry shop, a storage depot, and a maintenance garage.
